issues.description: The Stock.getStockIngredients() method has different return types in the template and the solution. In the template repository Stock.getStockIngredients() returns a List<StockIngredient> (Arrays.asList(this.stockIngredients)), while in the solution repository the method returns a StockIngredient[] (the backing array). Although the problem statement does not prescribe the exact signature for this getter, the exercise explicitly asks students to "add getters for all the private fields". This mismatch between template and solution can confuse students when they compare the starter code to the reference solution or when they try to rely on the reference for the expected getter signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the getter signature for stockIngredients across template and solution. Choose one return type and apply it consistently in both repositories (either StockIngredient[] or List<StockIngredient>). Update the template so students implement/see the same getter signature as in the reference solution (or update the solution to match the template) to avoid confusion.
